actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of General Services to provide, after consulting with the Attorney General, for the construction of a correctional center in Los Angeles County, Calif.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of General Services to construct a 500- inmate correctional center for Federal detainees in Los Angeles County, California.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of General Services to provide, after consulting with the Attorney General, for the construction of a correctional center in Los Angeles County, Calif.
